channel.title: Show-Off Board Vote
channel.description:
This thread is to see what our community truly wants,
Are you with or against a Show-Off board where you can show off anything you would like to basicly show off.
(Not RuneScape related though.)
Examples:
- A new videogame you made. - A new expensive watch you've bought. - A new spoiler you've putted on your car. - Something you made with Photoshop. - Your new laptop. - A special skill you have. - Your new dog. - And basicly anything that's capable of being showed off.

item.title: Show-Off Board Vote
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

Though I locked this.

Read full topic

item.title: Show-Off Board Vote
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:101, topic:403519”]A graphics/art section would barely get used. I’ve already stated my reasons why in previous posts.

Again - The show-off board being a “spam-section” is not a valid argument when you have the ability to disable the raising of post count for specific boards. The General Discussion board is a pile of spam. Just look at the first 5 pages and half of them are spam. The GD section has nothing to do with RSPS education either, which is why it should have been disabled for the post count as well.[/quote]Don’t try, MITB won’t make us the board anyway,

Read full topic

item.title: Show-Off Board Vote
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

A graphics/art section would barely get used. I’ve already stated my reasons why in previous posts.

Again - The show-off board being a “spam-section” is not a valid argument when you have the ability to disable the raising of post count for specific boards. The General Discussion board is a pile of spam. Just look at the first 5 pages and half of them are spam. The GD section has nothing to do with RSPS education either, which is why it should have been disabled for the post count as well.

Read full topic

Anyone who posts rsps stuff in mitb will get raped.

item.title: Show-Off Board Vote
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote=“MistaBigBoss, post:94, topic:403519”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=500578.msg3662221#msg3662221 date=1310416483]

So hey, let’s create a ‘Spam’ board, we can keep it there, but if people spam it’s easy to delete

I’ve never seen MITB do ‘trial’ stuff, why go through the effort for no reason?

Honestly, can you give me examples as to what would be posted here (and why they couldn’t go in general discussion)
besides graphics though, because like I said I agree with a graphics section

I’ve done ‘trial’ stuff before, we had a spam section once, the theory being that all the spam would be posted in there, and keep the rest of the sections clean. Sounds good, right? Except people got so used to spamming it went everywhere else too, and in the end it was removed.

That’s why I don’t want this ‘show off’ section, because it sounds so similar to a ‘spam’ section. If you want to have a DISCUSSION (think general discussion) about something you found/bought/made and show it off, post it in general discussion. If you want to simply spam a ‘look at my new expensive car’, ‘look at my great puppy’, then use something more appropriate, like twitter or facebook or something.
[/quote]Ok, well, what can I say, to everyone who supported this project, thanks for all your help, but in the end it’s not our decision.[/quote]

I offered you a reasonable alternative, It might be what you wanted but it’s close enough.

Read full topic

besides graphics though, because like I said I agree with a graphics section
[/quote]

I’ve done ‘trial’ stuff before, we had a spam section once, the theory being that all the spam would be posted in there, and keep the rest of the sections clean. Sounds good, right? Except people got so used to spamming it went everywhere else too, and in the end it was removed.

That’s why I don’t want this ‘show off’ section, because it sounds so similar to a ‘spam’ section. If you want to have a DISCUSSION (think general discussion) about something you found/bought/made and show it off, post it in general discussion. If you want to simply spam a ‘look at my new expensive car’, ‘look at my great puppy’, then use something more appropriate, like twitter or facebook or something.[/quote]Ok, well, what can I say, to everyone who supported this project, thanks for all your help, but in the end it’s not our decision.

item.title: Show-Off Board Vote
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote=“MistaBigBoss, post:91, topic:403519”][quote author=Jamie1200 link=topic=500578.msg3662142#msg3662142 date=1310414624]

  1. That is not an excuse, if you don’t want to moderate, then I’ll be glad to do so. (I’m not asking for mod I’m just saying it’s not an excuse, there are many resposible people that can be moderator free of charge).

  2. Theoretical they use the same user database, true that, but practical, we are different communities.

  3. I don’t like MITB, like many others, wich is why we don’t post there. Wich is why we want our own boards.
    We don’t care about your opinions about our stuff, we care about the opinions of this community.

Correction MITB don’t like us, We act like “Fucktards”. Its a respectable community.
[/quote]MITB don’t like use, but we don’t like MITB either. Point.[/quote]

None. Was simply saying.

Read full topic

item.title: Show-Off Board Vote
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote=“MistaBigBoss, post:86, topic:403519”][quote author=Jamie1200 link=topic=500578.msg3662106#msg3662106 date=1310412801]

[quote author=MistaBigBoss link=topic=500578.msg3662102#msg3662102 date=1310412490]

ANYTHING, can be put in the fucking general discussion, anything, that is not a fucking argument, why do you guys made all these seperate topics instead of just creating one board called General Shit? Because the general discussion is to specific.

You should know that while you guys are against this idea, more people are with me than against me.

Go to fucking Moparisthebest. We don’t need a spam-fest here. In all honesty if your that bothered about it go elsewhere.
[/quote]That’s not up to you to decide.

No your right it’s not. MITB has one. We don’t need one.
[/quote]We are not MITB![/quote]

No your right we are not. enough said!

[size=12pt]As Miss Silabsoft Said : - [/size]

[b]NO:

  1. It would require more boards for us to moderate and we simply cannot keep up with the shit moparscapers spew as it is.

  2. Go to Moparisthebest.com and post in the correct sections

  3. You will not be treated like a fucktard on mitb as long as you don’t act like a fucktard. Perfect example: When Frell started posting on mitb he was raped repetitively by other members for being a moron. After taking a few moments and cutting the shit frell is now a semi respected member on both boards. Of course he will always be remembered as a Fox news slag.[/b]

Read full topic

item.title: Show-Off Board Vote
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote=“MistaBigBoss, post:79, topic:403519”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=500578.msg3662067#msg3662067 date=1310411036]
So hey, let’s create a ‘Spam’ board, we can keep it there, but if people spam it’s easy to delete

I’ve never seen MITB do ‘trial’ stuff, why go through the effort for no reason?

Honestly, can you give me examples as to what would be posted here (and why they couldn’t go in general discussion)
besides graphics though, because like I said I agree with a graphics section
[/quote]I recently bought a mechanic Armani watch, cost me 560 dollars, that’s something I would like to put there.
Soon my new game will be finished, I would like to post it in a Show-Off board, some guy found a dog, he would like to show it to us. I tuned my car, I’d like to show it off in the show off board. Some guy upgraded his laptop and recently did a world wide performance compare (there’s a program) and he’d like to share his stats. Some guy learned how to fly, he’d like to show pictures of him flying and asking people how he could imrpove his flying technique.

I have many more.

A show-off board would give people the chance to show off their talent, and other people could give him feedback on how to improve or tell him how awesome he is.

A show-off board gives people the chance to show people what makes them special.[/quote]

This doesn’t come under General why?

ollie123:

Silabsoft lock incoming?

Good

Read full topic
